channel.title: Comments on: Taking It One Day at a Time

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! Hoping to get back to those asap!
item.content:encoded: Thanks! Hoping to get back to those asap!

item.title: By: flippertie
item.dc:creator: flippertie
item.description: I've been missing your game commentaries. Welcome back.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been missing your game commentaries. Welcome back.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks Devin! Let me know if you ever have any requests and I'll be sure to add it to the list!
item.content:encoded: Thanks Devin! Let me know if you ever have any requests and I’ll be sure to add it to the list!

item.title: By: Devin Rose
item.dc:creator: Devin Rose
item.description: Great to see you back! I got into Go here recently and I use your blog just about every time I'm looking for advice on books, or gameplay in general. Can't wait to see more new material!
item.content:encoded: Great to see you back! I got into Go here recently and I use your blog just about every time I’m looking for advice on books, or gameplay in general. Can’t wait to see more new material!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. Always glad to make things a party! Living life to the fullest with nothing barred!
item.content:encoded: Haha. Always glad to make things a party! Living life to the fullest with nothing barred!

item.title: By: Todd Bowlby
item.dc:creator: Todd Bowlby
item.description: Good to see you back. The Go scene was too quiet without your voice!
item.content:encoded: Good to see you back. The Go scene was too quiet without your voice!

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: Bring your best game, Ben. We may soon be facing each other across a goban! http://www.lamhirh.com/wp-content/images/sai-hikaru-no-go-illustrations-de-takeshi-obata/obata-sai-scan06.jpg
item.content:encoded:
